itunes:title: Hawaiʻi's Foodie Scene (with Mari Taketa)
title: Hawaiʻi's Foodie Scene (with Mari Taketa)
description:
The foodie scene in Hawaiʻi is ever popular, and always growing. Mari Taketa from Frolic explains why.
